name: Prime Ads
author: Proffit

sections.description: WordPress side of advertising monetization service Prime Ads (http://primeads.ru). It allows you to display a different set of ad units on a site without interfering with the code. All management takes place on the service side.
sections.installation:
1. Copy the folder prime-ads into the directory wp-content/plugins/ and activate the plugin.
  2. Go to http://primeads.ru and register.
  3. All other information you receive after registration in your account.
sections.faq:
soon…

Installation Instructions

  1. Copy the folder prime-ads into the directory wp-content/plugins/ and activate the plugin.
  2. Go to http://primeads.ru and register.
  3. All other information you receive after registration in your account.

short_description: Ответная часть сервиса монитизации Prime Ads (http://primeads.ru)
description: WordPress side of advertising monetization service Prime Ads (http://primeads.ru). It allows you to display a different set of ad units on a site without interfering with the code. All management takes place on the service side.
